value:
$nMPID_比翼ヒノカ|While I appreciate the work put
into the costuming, I can't help
but wonder...$k$pThere wasn't any way to add a little
more...costume to the costume?

$nMPID_カミラ|Take what you want, by force if
you must... The pirate's life might
be just my style.

$nMPID_比翼ヒノカ|I'm usually defending against pirates,
so I feel a little on edge wearing all
this, even if it is just a costume.

$nMPID_カミラ|Ooh, you want a better look at our
pirate costumes, do you? Well, don't
be shy... Come a little closer!

$nMPID_比翼ヒノカ|Are there pirates in your world
as well, $Nu?$k$pIf there are, you can count on our
help in pacifying them!

$nMPID_カミラ|As you can see, we are dressed in
pirate garb. The pirate festival is on
at $Nf's castle!

$nMPID_比翼ヒノカ|Ryoma, Takumi, Sakura, forgive me...
I am becoming a pirate in both body
and mind...

$nMPID_カミラ|I'll be taking all the treasure, thank
you very much—and I may just steal
your heart while I'm at it.

$nMPID_比翼ヒノカ|Playing the part of pirate is not my
favorite, as it turns out... Can we
reconsider this, Princess Camilla?

$nMPID_カミラ|To think I'd find such booty...
This pirate work isn't bad, is it?

P-pirates?! We—princesses—are
playing at being pirates? Princess
Camilla, what's going on here?!

$nMPID_カミラ|I believe the treasures we hold
in our hearts are very much the
same, Princess Hinoka.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ヒノカ|The treasure in our hearts, huh?
Hm... I think I know what you mean!$k$pI'm not sure how to describe it either,
but we seem to be on the same page.$k$p$nMPID_カミラ|The law and propriety are trivial
when it comes to protecting what
is truly precious to us.$k$pIf a precious thing is taken from us,
we go to any lengths to retrieve it,
no matter what.$k$pNo arbitrary rules would be able
to stop us!$k$p$nMPID_比翼ヒノカ|That's right I would use every
ounce of my strength to reclaim
such a thing!$k$p$nMPID_カミラ|Hm-hm-hmm... Perhaps you're more
suited for the pirate's life than you
had imagined, Princess Hinoka...$k$pI'm happy I thought to invite you
to come to this festival with me.
はあっ
射抜く！
きゃああっ
おのれ…
もうっ…
$nMPID_二人|For treasure!
$nMPID_二人|Now! This is our chance!
$nMPID_比翼ヒノカ|Commandeered!
$nMPID_カミラ|Too bad, really...
My...just deserts?
Ooh! How debonair!
Careful now.
"Playing pirates..." "Fun, isn't it?"
"I could get used to this..." "Really?"
Hehe
"Counting on you!" "Oh! I'm honored!"
Aye, aye...
Time to plunder!
X marks the spot.

$nMPID_比翼ヒノカ|...How did this happen? No princess
of Hoshido should be dressed up as a
pirate—let alone pretending to be one!

$nMPID_カミラ|Oh, it's not so bad, is it? You know,
I'm a princess too... And look, I'm
having fun, aren't I?

We all do what we must. As long
as we can enjoy ourselves at the
same time, why shouldn't we?

$nMPID_比翼ヒノカ|Hoshido is different. If the nobility
flaunt the rules, it sets a poor
example for the people.

$nMPID_カミラ|Oh, you're so serious! This is
supposed to be a festival, and
we're not in Hoshido—so relax!

Use your imagination... Imagine
we're pirates... Imagine we sail
the seas in search of treasure...

$nMPID_比翼ヒノカ|Rrrrright... Umm... All right.
Wait—what kind of treasure?

$nMPID_カミラ|Only the most lovely treasure of
them all... My dear Corrin! ...Who
has...been taken captive!
$nMPID_比翼ヒノカ|Taken captive?! By who?!

$nMPID_カミラ|Hmm... My brother Xander was
here as a pirate before... Let's
say he's taken Corrin!

$nMPID_比翼ヒノカ|Taken by the crown prince of
Nohr? Then we have no choice
but to save Corrin right away!

$nMPID_カミラ|You...do understand this is all
just imaginary, right?
$nMPID_比翼ヒノカ|The time for talk is over!

We'll crush Prince Xander and
get our Corrin back! Let's go,
Princess Camilla!

$nMPID_カミラ|O-oh... All right... Sorry in
advance, Brother...

Though it warms the heart
to see how she fights for our
dear Corrin... It's just precious.

We have some of the same sisterly
sensibilities, it seems... Friendship
blossoms upon the waves!
